basics.name: Applicant
basics.label: Business Development Manager
basics.summary: Highly organized, enthusiastic and financially astute professional with skills in multiple languages, Microsoft and Mac platforms, Google docs, Quicken and Tradeware's ordering, shipping and transportation management system.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Founded a language service to assist individuals and corporations with foreign language requirements. Offer Italian and French classes to professionals and children in a class room environment and privately. Develop proprietary teaching and training materials tailor made for each student group.
highlights: Created and planned business strategies and budgets to meet the company's sales objectives and increase business opportunities.
Generated opportunities for meetings with key decision makers to drive the sales process forward.
Initiated and implemented sales strategies to increase profitability with key accounts.
Provided leadership and networking knowledge to the customers and maintenance of an appropriate presence in the industry.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for the overall sales and marketing policies to reflect the company's strategies and objectives. Developed and implemented a sales and marketing program and corporate identity for this UK start-up company.
highlights: Initiated and executed a sales plan with the objective of growing the company in the North American market.
Successfully implemented the company's sales and marketing plan, which directly resulted in a new sister office being opened in the US.
